main event: A report from Project Blue Book documents the sighting of a long star-shaped object with a bright white glow on 28 July 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15 minutes,The object was moving toward the southwest,The sighting was conducted from a two-story observation post with field glasses,No photographs were included in the report despite the mention of photos,The observation conditions were described as very clear.
sighted object: long star-shaped object with bright glow
